src:
George W. Bush paints world leaders

06 Nov 2019, 06:06



George W. Bush's self portrait and a painting of his father, former President George H.W. Bush.Kevin Bohn/CNN

Few people knew former President George W. Bush enjoyed the hobby of painting. But at his presidential library in Dallas, some 30 portraits of world leaders can be seen in a gallery. Click on to see who Bush put down on canvas.
